edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.utility

Class SkeletalMetric

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.math.plex4.streams.utility.SkeletalMetric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractIntMetricSpace, AbstractObjectMetric<Simplex>, AbstractObjectMetricSpace<Simplex>

    public class SkeletalMetric
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbstractObjectMetricSpace<Simplex>
    This class implements a metric on a simplicial complex. The distance between two simplices is defined to be the maximum of the distances between the any two pairs of vertices where one vertex is in the first simplex and the other is in the second simplex.
    Author:
    Andrew Tausz

      • getPoints

        public Simplex[] getPoints()
        Description copied from interface: AbstractObjectMetricSpace
        This function returns the set of points in the metric space as an array. The returned array satisfies the requirement that the indices of the points in the array are equal to the indices of the points within the metric space.
        Specified by:
        getPoints in interface AbstractObjectMetricSpace<Simplex>
        Returns:
        an array containing the points of the metric space
